job.title: Senior Software Engineer
job.description: ltpgtWe are looking for an experienced Senior Software Engineer who is passionate and has cybersecurity experience The incumbent will be responsible for writing and coding individual programs presenting to clients and more ltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtDuties and ResponsibilitiesltpgtltulgtltligtInterpret business requirements and technical specificationsltligtltligtDesign APIs to encompass service functionalityltligtltligtPerform coding to technical specificationsltligtltligtInvestigate analyze and document reported defectsltligtltligtPerform maintenance programming and correction of identified defectsltligtltligtCreate and document and implement unit test plans scripts and test harnessesltligtltligtCreate and maintain technical documentation using defined technical documentation templatesltligtltligtParticipate in brainstorm sessions with the teamltligtltligtColead presentations demo our software and answer client questionsltligtltligtPerforms related duties as assignedltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtSkills  Attributes RequiredltpgtltulgtltligtMinimum of 5 years experienceltligtltligtSubstantial experience in CC and CltligtltligtMultithreading concurrent programming abilitiesltligtltligtSystemlevel applicationservices programming experienceltligtltligtKnowledge of database architecture and designltligtltligtStrong objectoriented programming skills and design patternsltligtltligtInternationalization experience is a plusltligtltligtGood communication skills team player and cooperativeltligtltligtAbility to interpret requirements and technical specificationsltligtltligtAbility to code software according to published standards and design guidelinesltligtltligtFlexible attitude ability to perform under pressureltligtltligtA commitment to quality and a thorough approach to the workltligtltligtAbility to work well within a teamltligtltligtAbility to work with minimal supervisionltligtltulgt
